intro: Pultenaea phylicoides, commonly known as the slender pultenaea, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Rhamnaceae and is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in coastal areas and sandy soils, often in heathlands or open forests. It is a shrub that can reach up to 1.5 meters in height, with hairy stems and glandular leaves. The flowers bloom in spring, attracting various pollinators such as bees and birds.
